means: 台面呢（一种厚毛呢，通常为绿色，用作台球桌、牌桌、门等的衬垫）

sentence.Network_en: He set it down carefully on the baize cloth.
sentence.Network_cn: 他小心翼翼地把它放在绿呢桌布上.

sentence.Network_en: The physics are also immaculate, with balls around on the baize.
sentence.Network_cn: 球在球桌上的滚动物理轨迹也是完美无瑕的.

sentence.Network_en: Cushion - rubber surrounds covered with baize.
sentence.Network_cn: 台岸 – 外覆粗呢的橡胶边岸.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 许国璋英语4 - 豆丁网 ... furnish 装备；布置 baize 台面呢(一种布料) lord 勋爵.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... bait-and-switch 玩诱饵调包手法的 baize 厚羊毛毯 bak sheesh 小费.
许国璋英语第四册单词表 - 新月空中英语 ... awe 敬畏 baize 厚羊毛毯,粗呢 bake 烘焙,烤.

list.abs: 2. Brazilian cottonBrazilian baize 巴西台面呢Brazilian piassava 巴西棕叶纤维

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French baies, feminine plural of bai 'chestnut-coloured' (see bay), treated as a singular noun. The name is presumably from the original colour of the cloth, although several colours are recorded

entry.tran: （用作牌桌、台球桌等衬垫的）台面呢
entry.def: Baize is a thick woollen material which is used for covering tables on which games such as cards and snooker are played.

means.word_mean: 1. a bright green fabric napped to resemble felt; used to cover gaming tables

auth_sentence.content: There were green baize curtains with little pompoms around the edge.
